Module Refresh

  • PCBLibraries.Refresh

  • public Module Refresh

    • Method Summary

      All Methods 
      Return Type Method and Description
      CollectionPublic Function RefreshAllTables(Optional iSynchronize As Integer = 0) As Collection

    • Method Detail

      • Public Function RefreshAllTables(Optional iSynchronize As Integer = 0) As Collection

        Public Function RefreshAllTables(Optional iSynchronize As Integer = 0) As Collection
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : RefreshAllTables
        ' Author : Nitin Dhaware
        ' Date : 7/20/2011
        ' Purpose : This function refreshes all boardwalk cuboids in the current template and returns corresponding transaction ids in a collection.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Synchronised--Optional argument that accepts 0 indicating asynchronised and 1 indicating synchronised.
        ' When synchronised refresh is carried out, the changes submitted not only by others but also by the user himself are refreshed.
        ' Whereas for asynchronised refresh, only those changes submitted by other users are refreshed to the boardwalk table.
        ' Returns: Collection
        ' * Collection of transaction ids--The collection that contains the transaction ids as values and corresponding cuboid ids as keys.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Public Function RefreshBWTable(bwt As BoardwalkTable, Optional iSynchronised As Integer = 0) As Long

        Public Function RefreshBWTable(bwt As BoardwalkTable, Optional iSynchronised As Integer = 0) As Long
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : RefreshBWTable
        ' Author : Siddhant Chothe
        ' Date : 4/25/2011
        ' Purpose : This function refreshes given boardwalk table in synchronised or asynchronised manner and returns the transaction id of the refresh action carried out on server.
        ' Note that the function automatically calls Prerefresh and Postrefresh events associated with boardwalk table.
        ' These events must follow the naming convention as
        ' -Public Sub _Prerefresh()
        ' -Public Sub _Postrefresh()
        ' where must be replaced by the actual boardwalk table name as viewed in "__BW_TABLE_PROPERTIES" sheet.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Boardwalk table--That needs to be refreshed.
        ' * Synchronised--Optional argument that accepts 0 indicating asynchronised and 1 indicating synchronised.
        ' When synchronised refresh is carried out, the changes submitted not only by others but also by the user himself are refreshed.
        ' Whereas for asynchronised refresh, only those changes submitted by other users are refreshed to the boardwalk table.
        ' Returns: Long
        ' * Transaction ID--That is returned by the server.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Public Function RefreshSelectedTables(colTables As Collection, Optional iSynchronize As Integer = 0) As Collection

        Public Function RefreshSelectedTables(colTables As Collection, Optional iSynchronize As Integer = 0) As Collection
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : RefreshSelectedTables
        ' Author : Nitin Dhaware
        ' Date : 7/20/2011
        ' Purpose : This function refreshes boardwalk cuboids passed as argument and returns corresponding transaction ids in a collection.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Collection of boardwalk tables--The collection that contains the boardwalk cuboids to refresh.
        ' * Synchronised--Optional argument that accepts 0 indicating asynchronised and 1 indicating synchronised.
        ' When synchronised refresh is carried out, the changes submitted not only by others but also by the user himself are refreshed.
        ' Whereas for asynchronised refresh, only those changes submitted by other users are refreshed to the boardwalk table.
        ' Returns: Collection
        ' * Collection of transaction ids--The collection that contains the transaction ids as values and corresponding cuboid ids as keys.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------
